title: Restore test subcommand list descriptions (limited to the first line each)

labels.name: stand-alone-tests
labels.description: Stand-alone (or smoke) tests for installed packages

body:
This commit restores the `spack test --help` subcommand list and limits the descriptions to the first line of the docstring of each.

The output before this PR (and before the `help` argument was switched to `description` so the description was added to the subcommand's help in #18721), the output was:
```
usage: spack test [-h] SUBCOMMAND ...

run spack's tests for an install

positional arguments:
  SUBCOMMAND
    run       Run tests for the specified installed packages
              
                  If no specs are listed, run tests for all packages in the current
                  environment or all installed packages if there is no active environment.
                  
    list      List all installed packages with available tests.
    find      Find tests that are running or have available results.
              
                  Displays aliases for tests that have them, otherwise test suite content
                  hashes.
    status    Get the current status for a particular Spack test suites.
    results   Get the results from Spack test suites (default all).
    remove    Remove results for a test from the test stage.
              
                  If no test is listed, remove all tests from the test stage.
              
                  Removed tests can no longer be accessed for results or status, and will not
                  appear in `spack test list` results.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit
```

With this PR the output is:
```
usage: spack test [-h] SUBCOMMAND ...

run spack's tests for an install

positional arguments:
  SUBCOMMAND
    run       Run tests for the specified installed packages.
    list      List all installed packages with available tests.
    find      Find tests that are running or have available results.
    status    Get the current status for a particular Spack test suites.
    results   Get the results from Spack test suites (default all).
    remove    Remove results for a test from the test stage.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit
```
